title: MCA: A Model School in South Africa
description: Utilization and adoption of the Cardano protocol is challenging for children in SA with limited access to computers and technical support.
solution: Create a lab/model school by merging Cardano's treasury, incentive, identity and governance systems with our school for vulnerable children.
experience: Ed and Keith (see Team) have 12 years experience founding, financing and growing MCA and Indlu Living. See comments by Charles below.
